title: Virtual Assist with Bookkeeping experience
job_overview:
We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented Virtual Assistant with bookkeeping experience to support our growing client base. This position is ideal for someone who is comfortable working independently, has excellent communication skills, and is proficient in QuickBooks Online. You will be responsible for handling day-to-day bookkeeping tasks, maintaining accurate records, and supporting client-specific needs across approximately six small business accounts.

Key Responsibilities:

Maintain and reconcile QuickBooks Online accounts for 6 small business clients

Categorize and record transactions (income, expenses, bank feeds)

Reconcile bank and credit card statements monthly

Prepare basic financial reports (P&L, balance sheet) for review

Manage and maintain digital filing systems for client documents

Handle light administrative tasks such as calendar reminders, email follow-ups, or onboarding requests

Assist with monthly/quarterly tax prep (gathering reports, organizing documentation)

Communicate professionally with clients regarding outstanding items or clarifications

Maintain confidentiality and uphold best practices in bookkeeping and data management
